title: A change to custom games is needed
body:
So this is my first discussion on the boards but i haven't seen too many posts like this one so i thought i may as well go ahead and say it.

I would love to see riot change up custom games to allow you to use every champion, yeah the free champ rotation is nice and all but wouldn't it be great if you could try out a champion in a custom game before you buy it? i know there's a lot of champions i personally would like to try out before buying but unfortunately cannot and i'm sure other summoners feel the same and would be encouraged to buy a champion if they had the time in a custom game to try out things first.

It's just a vague idea but you guys will get the gist of it

replies.body: I think i prefer the sandbox idea more.
